content: Yes, there are many interesting space facts that have been observed and studied. For example, did you know that the largest known volcano in the solar system is on Mars? It's called Olympus Mons, and it stands at a towering height of 22 km (13.6 miles), which is nearly three times the height of Mount Everest. It's so large that it actually causes the crust of Mars to bulge outwards.
